mapper.select: SELECT oi.id, oi.productQuantity, pr.id AS 'product.id', pr.name AS 'product.name', pr.productImage AS 'product.productImage', oi.totalPrice, oi.order_id AS 'order.id', oi.status_code AS 'status.code' FROM qsx_order_item oi, qsx_product pr WHERE oi.product_id = pr.id AND oi.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qsx_order_item ( productQuantity, product_id, totalPrice, order_id, status_code ) VALUES ( #{productQuantity}, #{product.id}, #{totalPrice}, #{order.id}, #{status.code} )
